title: Tour de France: Sepp Kuss is in, Brandon McNulty is out, which other US riders will race?
content:
Which US riders will start the Tour de France on July 1 in Bilbao? Here's the latest on who will make the grade.

Read the full article at Tour de France: Sepp Kuss is in, Brandon McNulty is out, which other US riders will race? on Velo.
